alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Mobile Inland; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Monroe, northern Mobile, northwestern Baldwin, southeastern Washington, south central Clarke and northwestern Escambia Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Uriah to 6 miles northeast of Chunchula. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Stockton, McCullough, Gulfcrest, Axis, Uriah, Mount Vernon, Calvert and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Mobile Inland; Monroe; Washington
